subject: Public Speaking
title: Churchill: Wartime Speeches
description: A micro-lesson that makes Churchill: Wartime Speeches usable.

hook.text: We shall never surrender. Churchill's words kept Britain fighting.

buildup.text: His wartime speeches combined historical reference and defiance.

discovery.text: During crisis, people want honest assessment plus determination.

twist.text: Churchill proved speeches CAN change history against all odds.

climax.text: In dark times, defiant clarity is its own kind of hope.

punchline.text: Speak defiantly in dark times. That's hope.
